name: Graves
_source: s;Titus;You've built them a beautiful place to rest.
s;Boudica;I had left for a raid. My warriors were with me.|We thought our camp was hidden.|I flew into a rage. I hunted down every bandit I could find.
s;Boudica;Some.{w} I do not regret it.|But then, I became lost.|I believe I still am.
s;Titus;You need to start a farm.
s;Titus;I'm serious. Lay down the axe and chariot.|Breed your horses.
s;Titus;Ha, I know you won't do it.|Fighting's a lifestyle, right?|But it's the only way I know to heal.|Just leave it all behind.
s;Boudica;I cannot believe you would take your own advice.
s;Titus;You've got me there. I'm like you.|I'll drop my blade once my arm goes limp.
s;Boudica;Then with what truth do you preach?
s;Titus;Watching the lives of old friends.{w} The farmers are happy.|More than I think I'll ever be.|It's tough to believe, I know. But it's worth a try.
s;Boudica;I will remain here until the sun sets.|Please allow us a moment alone.
s;Titus;Can do. I'll wait back in the clearing.
